title: Registration & Opening Ceremony
description: Welcome address, introduction to judges and mentors, announcement of challenges.

title: Hackathon Kickoff
description: Teams begin working on their projects. Mentors available for guidance.

title: Workshops & Tech Talks
description: Industry experts share insights and knowledge on cutting-edge technologies.

title: Final Submissions
description: Teams finalize and submit their projects for evaluation.

title: Project Presentations
description: Teams present their solutions to judges and audience.

title: Awards Ceremony
description: Announcement of winners and distribution of prizes.
